TopicTitle: My jet plane's engines keep breaking off at launch.

Articles.Content:
I\'m trying to make a jet plane, and it seems that I can\'t mount the engines any higher than they already are without changing the design entirely.

Is there any way I can mount the engines higher with stock parts? If not, is there an addon that fits onto the Mk3 fuselage that will let me mount them higher?

I\'ve attatched the craft file, and there\'s an image of the plane and a closeup of the engine mount in the spoiler. Warning, truly enormous images (and yet such crap quality!)

Put your landing gear on C7\'s pylons, and strut them down. That will increase ground clearance, hopefully giving you enough room to gently pull up.

If that doesn\'t add enough altitude, try adding structural fuselages (or even fuel tanks) to the place where you were going to have your landing gear. Then, put the landing gear under the tanks.
